summary: This is an email forwarding a notification about files uploaded from FBINET to UNET, specifically referencing an initial DVR update related to the Epstein case. It indicates ongoing investigative activity and evidence handling.

persons.name: Special Agent FBI New York Field Office Violent Crimes Task Force
persons.context: Appears as the recipient or sender of the forwarded email regarding uploaded files in the Epstein investigation.

events.title: FBINET to UNET File Upload Notification
events.description: An email is sent notifying about files uploaded from FBINET to UNET, specifically referencing an initial DVR update related to the Epstein case.
personsInvolved: Special Agent FBI New York Field Office Violent Crimes Task Force

keyFacts: The document is an email dated March 9, 2020, regarding the Epstein investigation.
It references files being uploaded from FBINET to UNET, indicating evidence transfer or sharing between FBI networks.
The subject line mentions an 'Initial DVR Update,' suggesting digital video recorder evidence is being processed or reviewed.
